participant_1.background:
I drive a convertible because it gives me the freedom to enjoy the open air and my ice cream.
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
i have a big family.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

participant_2.background:
I'm a hard worker with a sweet tooth.
I am a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin.
i m a wedding planner.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.

content.text: Hi there, my name is participant_1. How are you?
Hello, I'm good! Thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I am doing well. Thank you for asking. I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder. What do you do for a living?
I am a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin. I am also a wedding planner. I love to spend time with my book club and read books I love.
That sounds wonderful! I love to read as well. I spend most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.
Wow! That's amazing! I wish I had those skills. What kind of furniture do you like to build?
I mostly build tables and chairs. I also like to build bookcases and other pieces of furniture.
That's awesome! I love the idea of making your own furniture. It's so much more personal.
Yes, it is! I love being able to create something with my own hands.
That's great! I am sure your family loves your furniture.
They do! They always ask me to build them something new.
That's wonderful! I am glad you have such a supportive family.
Thank you! I am very lucky.
